title: Blotter, "Lijstwert; de grootste en de Kleinsie partij direct uit voorvad, maart 1935", 1935
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, mounted on blue blotting paper
provenance: Reinhold Brown Gallery, New York, NY
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Desk blotter and calendar with photographic image of the interior of a lumber warehouse at left. A black square with red text at lower center. calendar printed in red on a white background at lower right. Joining the photographic image and the area above the calendar, is an image of a bundle of fabricated building studs surrounded with a red glow. Across top and bottom of blotter, red lettering on black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blotter, "Lijstwert; de grootste en de Kleinsie partij direct uit voorvad, maart 1935", 1935.
1935. Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, mounted on blue blotting paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2004-1-2.
